casebody.data:
DICESARE, et al.
v.
The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY 156P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 26, 2017 Russ Ferguson, III, Attorney at Law, James P. Cooney, III, Attorney at Law, Mark J. Horoschak, Attorney at Law, Brian Allen Hayles, Attorney at Law, Sarah Motley Stone, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authority, d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System. Reynolds Michael Elliot, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for DiCesare, Christopher, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of May 2017 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of May 2017."
